Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.participant

Class ParticipantManager

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.participant.ParticipantManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirtyDataRetriever<String,Participant>
public class ParticipantManager extends Object implements DirtyDataRetriever<String,Participant>
This class provides functionalities to interact with the Participant db, creating, saving and deleting participants.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

    • getElementIfDirty

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Participant> getElementIfDirty(String key)
      Description copied from interface: DirtyDataRetriever
      Get a new element only if the requested element is dirty. This retriever needs to track the information on whether it is "dirty"/changed and needs to be reloaded If not altered this request returns a null object if it was "dirty" a new object is returned.
      Specified by:
      getElementIfDirty in interface DirtyDataRetriever<String,Participant>
      Parameters:
      key - the key for which to look up an element.
      Returns:
      a Future of the element associated with the key

    • createParticipant

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Participant> createParticipant(Study study, String signupToken, boolean tokenParticipant)
      Create a new Participant with empty information and retrieve a new ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      study - the study to create a participant in.
      signupToken - a signUpToken (optional, can be null or empty)
      tokenParticipant - whether the created Participant is a token participant
      Returns:
      A Future of the created Participant

    • deleteParticipant

      public void deleteParticipant(String id, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>> handler)
      Delete a participant and all associated data from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the participant
      handler - a handle to handle the (mongo client result of the deletion operation)

    • deleteParticipant

      public io.vertx.core.Future<String> deleteParticipant(String id)
      Delete a participant from the participant database. This does NOT remove other data associated with the participant.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the participant.
      Returns:
      A Future that indicates the project the deleted participant was in.

    • getDefaultParticipantInfo

      public static io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject getDefaultParticipantInfo(String projectID)
      Default schema of a Participant.
      Parameters:
      projectID - the project id for which to get default data
      Returns:
      an empty participant information JsonObject

    • save

      Save the given participant.
      Parameters:
      p - the Participant to save
      Returns:
      a Future of id of the Participant

    • updateResults

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> updateResults(Participant p, int step, String taskID, io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject results)
      Update the results for the given task.
      Parameters:
      taskID - the Task to be updated
      results - the results { an element of the resultData array with (or without) the task ID}
      p - the participant
      step - the step to update
      Returns:
      a Future indicating success of the operation

    • getParticipantStatusForProject

      public io.vertx.core.Future<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray> getParticipantStatusForProject(Study project)
      Get a JsonArray of JsonObject elements that contain the state of all participants (essentially this is a dump of the participants in this study)
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which to retrieve participant data
      Returns:
      A Future of the particpant data as a JsonArray of db entries( JsonObjects).

    • resetParticipant

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> resetParticipant(Participant part)
      Reset the Participant based on the given participants data and empty results.
      Parameters:
      part - the participant to reset
      Returns:
      a Future indicating success of the operation

    • updateOutputsForTask

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> updateOutputsForTask(Participant p, String taskID, io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray Outputs)
      TODO: Check if the timestamp from the input data needs to be updated... Update the outputs of a participant for the given TaskID and Outputs array.
      Parameters:
      p - The Participant to update
      taskID - the id of the Task for which to update the Outputs
      Outputs - The Output data
      Returns:
      A Successfull future if the outputs were updated.

    • updatePersistentData

      public io.vertx.core.Future<Void> updatePersistentData(Participant p, io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray Outputs, io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray outputNames)

      Parameters:
      p - The Participant to update
      Outputs - The Output data
      outputNames - the names of the outputs to update
      Returns:
      A Successfull future if the outputs were updated.

    • getParticipantsResults

      public io.vertx.core.Future<List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>> getParticipantsResults(io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray participantIDs, String projectID)
      Get the results for the participantIDs indicated in the provided JsonArray
      Parameters:
      participantIDs - The participant IDs for which to obtain data.
      projectID - Nullable. If null or an empty string, participants from multiple projects can be queried simultaneously. Otherwise, only the participants that fit to this projectID are returned.
      Returns:
      a Future of JsonObject which contain information on the participants (_id, steps, resultData and finished).

    • getParticipantsResultsForTask

      public io.vertx.core.Future<List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>> getParticipantsResultsForTask(io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray participantIDs, String studyID, String TaskID)
      Get the results for the participantIDs indicated in the provided study
      Parameters:
      participantIDs - a list of participant IDs
      studyID - the id of the study
      TaskID - the id of the task for which to get data
      Returns:
      A Future of a List of JsonObjects containing the results for the given participants in the given project and task

    • getParticipantIDForToken

      public io.vertx.core.Future<String> getParticipantIDForToken(String token, String projectID)
      Get the participant ID associated with the provided Token.
      Parameters:
      token - the provided token
      projectID - the project ID (as check that ID and project match).
      Returns:
      A Future of the Participants ID for the given Token in the Study
